---
name: Feature request
about: Request a new feature for the project
title: "[FEATURE] - Feature request template "
labels: feature
assignees: ''
---

## Summary
Provide a clear and concise description of the feature you are requesting.

## Motivation
Explain the problem this feature solves. Why is this important?

## Proposed Solution
Describe how the feature should ideally work. Be as objective and detailed as possible.

## Alternatives (Optional)
List any alternative solutions or workarounds you have considered.

## Additional Context (Optional)
Add any extra details, examples, screenshots, or references that help clarify the request.

## Breaking Changes (Optional)
Would this introduce breaking changes?  
If yes, explain how and what could be done to mitigate it.
